name: One More Night
description: Grab up to 3 friends to fortify a graveyard camp and hold off hordes of undead using tons of weapons and buildings!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 960 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
